column4: I just finished reading this paper: http://www.catb.org/~esr/writings/cathedral-bazaar/cathedral-bazaar/
please take care to avoid becoming what we call here in Brazil as "Ubuntonos" and "GNU/Chatos" :D
I was born right above you in British Guiana (now Guyana)
but you don't speark Portuguese, right?
I was referring to the British occupation, instead of the portuguese or dutch
they're responsible for me speaking only english
are you responsible for England, is that? :D
there are a lot of people that speak english and some dutch there, but no portuguese
definitely i have to train my English :D
